name: Akiyat
description:
A prototype of a fairy tale game, in the old style.
- two game screens
- no sound

Controls:
Walk - Arrows
Jump - Shift

v. 0.02
- added heart item to increase life
- a door is drawn, opening from the lever
- animations of opening doors are drawn
- animations were drawn for the main character
